text: Iryna Madziy (; 12 March 1970 – 11 April 2021) was a Ukrainian journalist and editor. She was a member of the National Union of Journalists of Ukraine (2007).Померла власкор «Вільного життя плюс» по Чортківському району Madziy died in Borshchiv on 11 April 2021, aged 51. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Ukrainian journalists Category:Editors
title: Iryna Madziy
